mod.name: Merc's Furniture
mod.author: TedDraws#0648 aka Mercenary
mod.description:
Adds in new furniture and objects! version 0.5
NEW FURNITURE -X1 Chair (Blue) -X1 Couch (Blue)
NEW OBJECTS -Poster (Soviet Bear) Bonus to Work Comfort (nullified by negative comfort) -Poster (Movie 1) Bonus to Leisure Comfort (nullified by negative comfort)
NEW STORAGE -Crew Locker
